name: FREERTOS
description: Indicates that FREERTOS is enabled and being used.

name: CM33
description: Indicates this is code running on the CM33 processor

name: CM33_0
description: Indicates this is code running on the first CM33 processor

name: CAT1
description: Indicates this device is a category 1 device. The categories are defined by Infineon and are used to group similiar devices or device families together.

name: CAT1A
description: Indicates this device is a category 1 device from the PSOC 6 family.

name: CAT1D
description: Indicates this device is a category 1 device from the PSOC Edge family.

name: CM0P_SLEEP
description: Indicates this is application is running on a PSOC 6 device but is only using the Cortex M4 processor.  After initialization of the system, the Cortex M0+ processor is in sleep mode.

name: CM4
description: Indicates this is code running on the CM4 processor

name: CM4_0
description: Indicates this is code running on the first CM4 processor if there are multiple CM4 processors.

name: HCI-UART
description: Indicates this code is using the HCI-UART protocol to communicate with a BLE/Bluetooth wireless device.

name: MURATA-1YN
description: Indicates this code assuming the use of the Murata 1Y module, which support both BLE and Wi-Fi.

name: LWIP
description: Indicates this is code using the Lightweight IP (LWIP) stack.

name: MBEDTLS
description: Indicates this codeis using the MBEDTLS library from Arm

name: Debug
description: Indicates this code is being built for debugging.  This will include debug symbols and other information to assist in debugging the code.

name: Release
description: Indicates this code is being built for release.  This will include optimizations and other changes to improve performance and reduce size.

name: GCC_ARM
description: Indicates this code is being built using the GCC ARM toolchain.
Indicates this code is being built to work with a 55500 wireless device.

name: 55500A1
description: Indicates this code is being built to work with a 55500A1 wireless device.

name: 4343W
description: Indicates this code is being built to work with a 4343W wireless device.
Indicates this code is being built to work with a 43439 wireless device.
